(Simplified: 涝)
Chinese Definition: Antonyms: 旱
Pictophonetic: 勞 indicates the sound; 氵 (water) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 氵 [ shuǐ ] water
    • 勞 [ láo ] to labor, to toil; to do manual work
①雨水過多，莊稼被淹，與“旱”相對：抗旱防澇。澇災。
②因雨水過多而積在田裏或低窪處的水：排澇救災。
(Simplified: 涝)
Chinese Definition: Antonyms: 旱
Pictophonetic: 勞 indicates the sound; 氵 (water) conveys the meaning.
Hanzi: 涝

Main pronunciation 主要发音: lào

Original meaning 本义: Meaning to inundate.

English senses 英语理解: inundate, flood; torrent

Usage example 用法举例: 澇害 lào hài (waterlog)

Importance by frequency 常用频率: 3436

Shuowen 说文解字: 水出扶風鄠北入渭從水勞聲

Character decomposition 字形分解 :
Compound 澇 from three-dot-water 氵 shuǐ and phonetic labor (劳)勞労 láo simp 涝.

澇字的基本解释

澇
lào
见“涝”。

澇字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lào］
［《廣韻》郎到切，去号，來。］
“涝1”的繁体字。亦作“潦2”。
(1)水淹没；雨多成灾。
(2)指淹没田地的积水。
(3)浇灌，灌溉。参见“澇田”。
[②]［láo］
［《廣韻》魯刀切，平豪，來。］
［《廣韻》盧晧切，上晧，來。］
“涝2”的繁体字。
(1)水名。在今陕西省境内，为关中八川之一。
(2)水名。在今山西省境内，源出浮山县黑山，西流合潏水，至临汾市北入汾水。
(3)大波。
(4)同“撈”。

澇字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　澇； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页651第28
【廣韻】魯刀切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】郞刀切，?音勞。水名。【說文】水出扶風鄠北。亦作潦。【司馬相如·上林賦】酆鎬潦潏。【註】潦，卽澇水。　又灘名。【水經注】漢水，又東謂之澇灘。　又大波也。【木華·海賦】飛澇相磢。　又【廣韻】盧皓切【集韻】魯晧切，?音老。義同。　又【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】?郞到切，勞去聲。義同。一曰淹也。

澇字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

澇字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
waterlogging
lào
See "waterlogging".
waterlogging
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lào］
["Guangyun" Lang to cut, go to the number, come. ]
Traditional characters for "Water 1". Also known as "潦2".
(1) Flooding; rain is plagued by disasters.
(2) Refers to the standing water that floods the field.
(3) Watering and irrigation. See "waterlogged field".
[②]［láo］
["Guangyun" Lu knife cut, Pinghao, come. ]
["Guangyun" Lu Haoqie, Shang Hao, come. ]
The traditional characters of "Water 2".
(1) Water name. In today's Shaanxi Province, it is one of the eight rivers in Guanzhong.
(2) Water name. In today's Shanxi Province, it originated from the Heishan Mountains of Fushan County, flowed together in the west, and entered Fenshui in the north of Linfen City.
(3) Big wave.
(4) Same as "fishing".
waterlogging
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　log; Kangxi strokes: 16; Page number: page 651 28
[Guang Yun] Lu knife cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Tan knife cut,? Yin Lao. Water name. [Said the text] Water flows out of Fufeng Hubei. Also for scrawl. 【Sima Xiangru·Shanglin Fu】Feng Hao scribbled. [Note] 潦, 卽 waterlogging.　The name of the beach. [Notes on Water Classics] Han River is also called the floodplain in the east.　It's a big wave again. 【Muhua·Haifu】Flying and flooding.　[Guangyun] Lu Haoqie [Jiyun] Lu Haoqie, the sound is old. The same meaning.　[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? It’s so hard to cut, please go. The same meaning. One said flooded.
